description:
Friday’s global IT outage, caused by a flawed software update from cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike, affected Brazilian businesses, banks, and airports. The presidential press office confirmed that the Gov.br platform, used by millions of Brazilians for various services, was not affected. The federal government’s Digital Government Integrated Cybersecurity Center (CISC) is monitoring the situation. The Supreme […]

The post Effects of CrowdStrike IT outage show up in Brazil appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Effects of CrowdStrike IT outage show up in Brazil
